column2: Double-click to gain a pile of harpy feathers.

Enclosed is your candy-powered matter meter, developed by the Durmand Priory (inspired by the College of Statics).

Each meter is powered by candy corn. The elusive material has close ties to the Mad King's realm, which leaks over into Tyria at this time of year.

Using a kernel as a focus, you can scan four different frequencies: aqueous, gaseous, etheric, and corporeal. There are suspicious locations on all four frequencies, and it's up to you to discover them.

Try it with the little ghost standing right next to me. She's hiding behind an etheric veil, so use the etheric frequency!

You'll notice, on your journey, that each page from the Mad King's past contains clues on how to proceed. Pay close attention to these clues, for they are the only way you will piece together the past and complete our volume of Mad Memoires.

We're missing six stories. Now get moving! We only have so long before the energies of the Mad Realm vanish again!

—Magister Tassi
Upgrade has been used recently. You must wait to activate it again.
Amount of time required to finish building once started. Can be reduced for additional influence.

Double-click to gain a Molachev Cocktail bundle item.

%str1%, 

Thanks for showing those Separatists what it means to mess with Redreave Mill. It's invigorating to see someone like you in action. You keep taking it to the Separatists, and we'll keep the saws humming. 

— Tamor Woodreave
Half of a family heirloom pendant that has been lost for years.

I have my own special recipe that makes these burn a little hotter than normal. Watch your eyebrows."
—Waldo"

The little ghost that has been tugging at my robes is standing right next to me. You can't miss her if you scan on the etheric wavelength.
Double-click to gain a pile of gunk.
8 Slots. If possible, crafting materials and upgrade components will fill this bag before other empty spaces. The contents of this bag will not move when inventory is sorted.
8 Slots. Items in this bag will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list and will not move when inventory is sorted.
To join the battle, click on [lbracket]Go to World vs. World[rbracket] and then click on the name of the map you'd like to fight in.
You've been inflicted with a condition! Conditions are harmful states that you and your enemies can inflict on each other.
